import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{TextField,Button,Box,Typography,Paper}from"@mui/material";import{API_MSREPARACIONES}from"../config/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Register(){const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const[success,setSuccess]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleRegister=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError("");setSuccess("");try{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_MSREPARACIONES,"/auth/register"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})// Solo USER
